name: Secondhand (note - colt, Scribbles & Inks, Raelle, TheRedSwaRM, Rwenrwen, darandan, Meguu-kun)
name_original: Secondhand (note - colt, Scribbles & Inks, Raelle, TheRedSwaRM, Rwenrwen, darandan, Meguu-kun)
description:
Secondhand is a cozy point-and-click game starring Coco Marvyn, the manager of a run-down thrift shop. Help him as he prepares the next item up for sale, and perhaps, even meet friends along the way.

(Note: This game is still a work in progress)

Made for DevelUP's Halloween Jam 2022.

Credits
